channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
i want to create my own rsps, i checked the tutorial section and looked at this:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
but i need a source and a client? i dont know how it works, i do know some java codings and i want to start as soon as possible please help me

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @shlomi84 shlomi84
item.description:
@shlomi84 wrote:

[quote=“kronixz, post:6, topic:439142”][quote author=shlomi84 link=topic=541841.msg3969739#msg3969739 date=1334029867]
its not lazy, i’ve been searching how to make rsps for weeks and i got a 2 source’s already that didnt work so i was just going to ask if u had a good one…
[/quote]
Project annihilation[/quote]

i found this:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,410315.0.html

everytime i try to log in it says error connecting to server.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“kronixz, post:6, topic:439142”][quote author=shlomi84 link=topic=541841.msg3969739#msg3969739 date=1334029867]
its not lazy, i’ve been searching how to make rsps for weeks and i got a 2 source’s already that didnt work so i was just going to ask if u had a good one…
[/quote]
Project annihilation[/quote]
Not a recommended first base from my point of view. It’s Hyperion, which is a bit complex for someone new to Java/RSPS programming.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“shlomi84, post:3, topic:439142”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=541841.msg3969721#msg3969721 date=1334028556]
Lol ok, go tk the server download section, pick a source(the files that make it work?) and client (to play the game?) That you like. Next go buy a java book :I or be epic noob leecher
[/quote]

60% done “sams teach yourself java in 24 hours” i have a good understanding of it and my 1st language was visual basic.
now can u find me a source please just a basic source with godsword/dclaw/korasi and special attack working and thanks alot :P[/quote]
There’s a board filled with downloads. Don’t make us do ur work… Lazy.

Read full topic
